thread.section_title: Artfinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Artfinder | artfinder.com | 3 of 43
thread.title: brian dumican

author: brian dumican
title: brian dumican
text:
This was my first experience of buying art online.
The ordering process was straightforward and professional. Good website with useful filters which helped to reduce the vast amout of paintings available to those that met my specific needs. Order fulfilment was very good with excellent communication from the artist and the delivered artwork exceeded my expectations. Worthy of support from art lovers!
